Job Description:
Our team is seeking a Data Analyst with experience in data visualization and statistical analysis.

**Skills**: SQL, Excel, Tableau, Python (for data analysis)
**Experience**: 1-3 years as a Data Analyst or related role
**Education**: Bachelor’s in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field

Your role will involve interpreting data to help improve business outcomes and providing actionable insights to stakeholders.
